scripts.start:docs: cd docs && CI=true npm run start
scripts.build:docs: cd docs && CI=true npm run build
scripts.st:lint: tsc --noEmit -p ./libs/ngrx-entity-relationship/tsconfig.lib.json && tsc --noEmit -p ./libs/ngrx-entity-relationship/tsconfig.spec.json && npm run lint ngrx-entity-relationship
scripts.st:build: rm -Rf tmp && rm -Rf dist && npm run st:lint && npm run build -- --project ngrx-entity-relationship --prod --skip-nx-cache && cp ./libs/ngrx-entity-relationship/package.json ./dist/libs/ngrx-entity-relationship && cp -r ./libs/ngrx-entity-relationship/e2e ./dist/libs/ngrx-entity-relationship && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/ngrx-entity-relationship && cp ./CHANGELOG.md ./dist/libs/ngrx-entity-relationship && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/libs/ngrx-entity-relationship
scripts.st:e2e: npm run st:build && npm run i:a && npm run s:a &&  npm run s:test && npm run test:a && npm run e2e:a && npm run b:a
scripts.i:a: npm run i:a6 && npm run i:a7 && npm run i:a8 && npm run i:a9 && npm run i:a10 && npm run i:a11 && npm run i:r7
scripts.i:a6: cd e2e/a6 && npm install --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a7: cd e2e/a7 && npm install --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a8: cd e2e/a8 && npm install --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:a9: cd e2e/a9 && npm install --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall && ./node_modules/.bin/ngcc
scripts.i:a10: cd e2e/a10 && npm install --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall && ./node_modules/.bin/ngcc
scripts.i:a11: cd e2e/a11 && npm install --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall && ./node_modules/.bin/ngcc
scripts.i:ci:a: npm run i:ci:a6 && npm run i:ci:a7 && npm run i:ci:a8 && npm run i:ci:a9 && npm run i:ci:a10 && npm run i:ci:a11 && npm run i:r7
scripts.i:ci:a6: cd e2e/a6 && npm ci --no-optional --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:ci:a7: cd e2e/a7 && npm ci --no-optional --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:ci:a8: cd e2e/a8 && npm ci --no-optional --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall
scripts.i:ci:a9: cd e2e/a9 && npm ci --no-optional --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall && ./node_modules/.bin/ngcc
scripts.i:ci:a10: cd e2e/a10 && npm ci --no-optional --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall && ./node_modules/.bin/ngcc
scripts.i:ci:a11: cd e2e/a11 && npm ci --no-optional --ignore-scripts && node ./node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run postinstall && ./node_modules/.bin/ngcc
scripts.s:a: npm run s:a6 && npm run s:a7 && npm run s:a8 && npm run s:a9 && npm run s:a10 && npm run s:a11 && npm run s:r7
scripts.s:test: npm run s:test:a6 && npm run s:test:a7 && npm run s:test:a8 && npm run s:test:a9 && npm run s:test:a10 && npm run s:test:a11
scripts.b:a: npm run b:a6 && npm run b:a7 && npm run b:a8 && npm run b:a9 && npm run b:a10 && npm run b:a11 && npm run b:r7
scripts.b:a6: cd e2e/a6 && npm run build && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a7: cd e2e/a7 && npm run build && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a8: cd e2e/a8 && npm run build && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a9: npm run b:a9:off && npm run b:a9:on
scripts.b:a9:off: cd e2e/a9 && npm run build:ivy-off && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a9:on: cd e2e/a9 && npm run build:ivy-on && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a10: npm run b:a10:off && npm run b:a10:on
scripts.b:a10:off: cd e2e/a10 && npm run build:ivy-off && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a10:on: cd e2e/a10 && npm run build:ivy-on && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a11: npm run b:a11:off && npm run b:a11:on
scripts.b:a11:off: cd e2e/a11 && npm run build:ivy-off && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:a11:on: cd e2e/a11 && npm run build:ivy-on && rm -Rf dist
scripts.b:r7: cd e2e/r7 && npm run build && rm -Rf build
scripts.e2e:a: npm run e2e:a6 && npm run e2e:a7 && npm run e2e:a8 && npm run e2e:a9 && npm run e2e:a10 && npm run e2e:a11
scripts.e2e:a9: npm run e2e:a9:off && npm run e2e:a9:on
scripts.e2e:a10: npm run e2e:a10:off && npm run e2e:a10:on
scripts.e2e:a11: npm run e2e:a11:off && npm run e2e:a11:on
scripts.test:a: npm run test:a6 && npm run test:a7 &&npm run test:a8 && npm run test:a9 && npm run test:a10 && npm run test:a11 && npm run test:r7
scripts.test:a9: npm run test:a9:off && npm run test:a9:on
scripts.test:a10: npm run test:a10:off && npm run test:a10:on
scripts.test:a11: npm run test:a11:off && npm run test:a11:on
scripts.test:r7: cd e2e/r7 && CI=1 npm run test

hooks.pre-commit: lint-staged && npm run lint && npm run test
